With file-based storage and no database required, it offers one-click Docker deployment and NAS compatibility for personal or intranet use.

summary.en: Afilmory is a modern, high-performance photo gallery platform for photographers, featuring S3/GitHub sync, EXIF metadata display, interactive maps, and a WebGL-based viewer. Built with React + TypeScript, it offers responsive masonry layouts, HDR support, Fujifilm recipe rendering, and both SaaS and self-hosting options.

summary.en: Input Leap is an open-source KVM software that enables keyboard and mouse sharing across multiple computers via software, mimicking hardware KVM switches. It supports Windows, macOS, Linux, and FreeBSD, allowing control switching by moving the mouse to screen edges or using hotkeys. Clipboard sharing is supported (except on Linux/Wayland). The project prioritizes simplicity, cross-platform compatibility, and open communication.

summary.en: A personal portfolio and blog built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, managed via Turborepo. Features MDX support, RSS, comments, view counters, and smooth animations with Motion. Delivers near-perfect Lighthouse scores in performance, SEO, and accessibility.

metadata.name: mcp-chrome

summary.en: Chrome MCP Server is a Chrome extension-based Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes browser functionality to AI assistants like Claude, enabling automation, content analysis, and semantic search. It runs locally, supports cross-tab operations, integrates 20+ tools, and uses SIMD-accelerated AI for faster vector processing.

summary.en: GPT-SoVITS is a powerful few-shot voice conversion and text-to-speech (TTS) system that enables high-quality voice cloning with just 1 minute of training data. It supports zero-shot and few-shot inference, cross-lingual synthesis (Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Cantonese), and includes a WebUI with tools for voice separation, dataset segmentation, and ASR. With fast inference (RTF as low as 0.014 on RTX 4090), it's ideal for personalized voice applications.

metadata.name: mcp-feedback-enhanced

summary.en: MCP Feedback Enhanced is an advanced MCP server designed for interactive user feedback and command execution in AI-assisted development. It features dual interfaces (Web UI & Desktop App), intelligent environment detection (SSH/WSL), cross-platform support, session tracking, auto-command execution, and rich Markdown summaries to boost development efficiency.

summary.en: Google AI Edge Gallery is an experimental app showcasing on-device generative AI use cases, enabling fully offline model execution on Android and iOS. Users can explore image understanding, audio transcription, prompt engineering, mini-games, and fine-tuned modelsâ€”all running locally without internet.

summary.en: This project demonstrates a fullstack app with a React frontend and a LangGraph-powered backend agent using Gemini 2.5. The agent dynamically generates search queries, performs web research via Google Search API, reflects on results to identify knowledge gaps, and iteratively refines searches to produce well-cited, comprehensive answersâ€”ideal for research-augmented conversational AI.

summary.en: Deep Research is a privacy-focused, AI-powered tool that generates in-depth research reports in minutes using various LLMs like Gemini, OpenAI, and Ollama. Deployable on Vercel and Cloudflare, it integrates SSE API and MCP server for flexible, secure, and fast research workflows.

summary.en: Open-Sora is an open-source initiative focused on efficient, high-quality video generation. The latest 2.0 version features an 11B-parameter model matching top-tier models in performance, with fully open training code and checkpoints, trained for only $200K, democratizing access to advanced video synthesis.

metadata.name: read-bridge

summary.en: MoneyPrinterTurbo is an AI-powered tool that automatically generates high-definition short videos from a single topic or keyword. metadata.name: FastGPT

summary.en: AnythingLLM is an all-in-one desktop and Docker AI application featuring built-in RAG, AI agents, a no-code agent builder, and MCP compatibility. It enables users to chat with documents by converting any content into LLM-usable context, with support for multi-user management and flexible LLM/vector database selection.

metadata.name: rag-web-ui

summary.en: RAG Web UI is an intelligent dialogue system leveraging Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology. It supports multi-format document ingestion, automatic chunking and vectorization, integrates with various LLMs (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Ollama), and offers a frontend-backend separated architecture with high-performance vector databases (ChromaDB/Qdrant) and OpenAPI support for private knowledge base Q&A.

It aims to purify the browsing experience with routing rules, plugins, and icon resources, including IP spoofing support (e.g., for Douyin), while promoting open-source ethics and responsible usage.

summary.en: This is the world's largest free and open-source Midjourney API proxy platform, generating over 1 million images daily. It supports drawing via Discord and Youchuan, offering full-featured APIs, distributed deployment, account pool management, real-time task tracking, Chinese prompt translation, content filtering, and one-click face swapping for images and videos, with an integrated admin UI and Swagger docs.

summary.zh: è¯¥é¡¹ç›®åˆ©ç”¨æ‰©æ•£æ¨¡å‹ä¸ºé»‘ç™½å›¾åƒä¸Šè‰²ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨LABè‰²å½©ç©ºé—´åˆ†ç¦»äº®åº¦ä¸é¢œè‰²ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚æ¨¡å‹åŸºäºUNetæ¶æ„ï¼Œåœ¨è®­ç»ƒæ—¶ä»…å¯¹ABé¢œè‰²é€šé“åŠ å™ªï¼Œä¿ç•™Lé€šé“ä½œä¸ºæ¡ä»¶è¾“å…¥ï¼Œå¹¶ç»“åˆç°åº¦å›¾ç‰¹å¾è¿›è¡Œæ¡ä»¶åŒ–å»å™ªã€‚é¡¹ç›®å±•ç¤ºäº†å‰å‘æ‰©æ•£ä¸å»å™ªè¿‡ç¨‹çš„å¯è§†åŒ–ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå›¾åƒä¿®å¤ä¸å†å²å½±åƒå¤åŸç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: This project uses diffusion models to colorize grayscale images by leveraging the LAB color space, where the L channel (grayscale) is preserved and only the AB color channels are noised during training. A UNet-based model denoises the color channels conditioned on the L channel and extracted grayscale features, enabling realistic color restoration for applications like photo restoration and archival imaging.

summary.en: AigoTools is an open-source tool for quickly building and managing website directories, featuring auto-crawling, internationalization, SEO optimization, and multi-platform image storage (e.g., MinIO, AWS S3). It supports one-click deployment via Docker or Zeabur, ideal for creating custom navigation sites.

It integrates Giscus for comments and NuxtUI for UI, featuring full-text search, WYSIWYG Markdown editing, friend link screenshots, and SEO optimization, deployed on Zeabur with cost-efficient containerization.

summary.en: Pic Smaller is a client-side image compression tool supporting JPEG, PNG, WEBP, AVIF, SVG, and GIF. Built with Vite + React, it leverages OffscreenCanvas, WebAssembly, and Web Workers for fast, secure local processing without server dependency. Features include format conversion, color reduction, and a drag-to-compare preview, optimized for both desktop and mobile.

summary.en: QuickRecorder is a lightweight, high-performance screen recorder for macOS built on ScreenCapture Kit. It supports recording screens, windows, apps, and mobile devices with features like driver-free audio loopback, mouse highlighting, and screen magnifier. Compatible with macOS 12.3+, it enables HEVC with Alpha recording, real-time presenter overlay (macOS 14), and independent system/microphone audio track control for post-editing.

summary.en: Auto.js is an Android-based JavaScript automation IDE leveraging accessibility services for UI control operations, screenshot analysis, OCR, and on-device AI inference (YOLOv8, PaddleOCR, ONNXRuntime). This modified version fixes memory leaks, enhances Android 12 support, and integrates multiple inference engines for stable automation in apps like Ant Forest.

summary.zh: FunClip æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€æºã€ç²¾å‡†ä¸”æ˜“ç”¨çš„è§†é¢‘è¯­éŸ³è¯†åˆ«ä¸å‰ªè¾‘å·¥å…·ï¼ŒåŸºäºé˜¿é‡Œäº‘é€šä¹‰è¯­éŸ³å®éªŒå®¤çš„ FunASR æ¨¡å‹å®ç°é«˜ç²¾åº¦è¯­éŸ³è½¬å†™ï¼Œå¹¶æ”¯æŒé€šè¿‡ LLM å®ç°æ™ºèƒ½å‰ªè¾‘ã€‚ç”¨æˆ·å¯è‡ªç”±é€‰æ‹©æ–‡æœ¬ç‰‡æ®µæˆ–æŒ‡å®šè¯´è¯äººè¿›è¡Œè§†é¢‘è£å‰ªï¼Œé›†æˆ Paraformerã€CAM++ ç­‰å·¥ä¸šçº§æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä¸­è‹±æ–‡è¯†åˆ«ã€çƒ­è¯å¢å¼ºä¸å¤šæ®µå‰ªè¾‘ï¼Œæä¾› Gradio äº¤äº’ç•Œé¢ï¼Œé€‚åˆæœ¬åœ°éƒ¨ç½²ä¸æœåŠ¡å™¨è®¿é—®ã€‚
summary.en: FunClip is an open-source, accurate, and user-friendly video speech recognition and clipping tool powered by Alibaba's FunASR models. It enables precise ASR with timestamp prediction, supports LLM-based intelligent clipping via Qwen/GPT, allows speaker-specific trimming using CAM++, and offers hotword customization. With Gradio interface, it supports multi-segment clipping, SRT subtitle export, and local/server deployment for both Chinese and English content.

It handles JavaScript rendering, dynamic content, media parsing (PDFs, DOCX, images), batch processing, and user actions like clicks and scrolls, offering high reliability and customization for AI agents and knowledge systems.

summary.en: MediaCrawler is a multi-platform content scraping tool powered by Playwright, supporting data collection from major Chinese social platforms like Xiaohongshu, Douyin, Kuaishou, Bilibili, Weibo, Tieba, and Zhihu. summary.en: How To Ask Questions The Smart Way is a classic guide by Eric S. Raymond on how to effectively ask technical questions to get useful answers. metadata.name: Open-Assistant

summary.en: kafka-python is a full-featured Python client for Apache Kafka, compatible with versions 0.8 to 4.0. summary.en: django-notifications is a Django app mimicking GitHub's notification system, designed for user-centric event alerts. summary.en: A Telegram bot designed to distribute localized language files for Telegram clients. It allows uploading translation files, retrieving file IDs, and assigning them to Android, iOS, or Desktop platforms via simple commands, streamlining the localization workflow.

metadata.name: django-persistent-messages
metadata.description: A Django app for unified and persistent user messages/notifications, built on top of Django's messages framework

summary.zh: Django Persistent Messages æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº Django æ¶ˆæ¯æ¡†æ¶çš„æ‰©å±•åº”ç”¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæŒä¹…åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸é€šçŸ¥ã€‚è®¤è¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ¶ˆæ¯å¯å­˜å‚¨äºæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œå®ç°è·¨ä¼šè¯çš„â€œç²˜æ€§â€æé†’ï¼Œç›´è‡³ç”¨æˆ·ä¸»åŠ¨æ ‡è®°ä¸ºå·²è¯»ï¼›åŒ¿åç”¨æˆ·ä»ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤ä¼šè¯æœºåˆ¶ã€‚æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€ APIï¼Œæ”¯æŒå±å¹•å±•ç¤ºä¸é‚®ä»¶é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œå¢å¼ºæ¶ˆæ¯è§¦è¾¾ç‡ã€‚
summary.en: Django Persistent Messages extends Django's messaging framework to support persistent, cross-session user notifications. Authenticated users' messages are stored in the database and remain visible until marked as read, while anonymous users rely on session-based storage. It offers a unified API for both user types and supports on-screen display and email notifications.

metadata.name: django-persistent-messages
metadata.description: My independent fork of django-persistent-messages. A Django app for unified and persistent user messages/notifications, built on top of Django's messages framework

summary.zh: Django Persistent Messages æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº Django æ¶ˆæ¯æ¡†æ¶çš„æ‰©å±•åº”ç”¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæŒä¹…åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸é€šçŸ¥ã€‚å®ƒå…è®¸è®¤è¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ¶ˆæ¯å­˜å‚¨äºæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œå®ç°è·¨ä¼šè¯ä¿ç•™ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›æ ‡è®°å·²è¯»ã€åˆ é™¤ç­‰äº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚åŒ¿åç”¨æˆ·ä»ä½¿ç”¨ä¼šè¯å­˜å‚¨ã€‚è¯¥åº”ç”¨æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€ APIï¼Œå…¼å®¹ Django åŸç”Ÿæ¶ˆæ¯ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¾¿äºé›†æˆã€‚
summary.en: Django Persistent Messages is a Django app extending the built-in messages framework to support persistent user notifications. It stores messages in the database for authenticated users, enabling cross-session persistence with features like marking as read or deletion. Anonymous users use session-based storage. Offers a unified API compatible with Django's native messaging system.

metadata.name: django-monitio
metadata.description: Unified, persistent user messages with live notifications via SSE for Django.

summary.zh: django-monitio æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸º Django æä¾›æŒä¹…åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸å®æ—¶é€šçŸ¥çš„æ‰©å±•ï¼ŒåŸºäº Redis å’Œ SSE å®ç°æ¶ˆæ¯çš„å­˜å‚¨ä¸æ¨é€ã€‚æ”¯æŒè®¤è¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ•°æ®åº“æŒä¹…åŒ–æ¶ˆæ¯ã€åŒ¿åç”¨æˆ·çš„ä¼šè¯æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œå¹¶é›†æˆé‚®ä»¶é€šçŸ¥åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚é¡¹ç›®ä¾èµ– django-sseã€django-redis ç­‰ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºéœ€è¦è·¨ä¼šè¯æ¶ˆæ¯ç®¡ç†çš„ Web åº”ç”¨ã€‚
summary.en: django-monitio is a Django extension for persistent user messages and live notifications via Server-Sent Events (SSE), backed by Redis. It supports database-stored messages for authenticated users and session-based messages for anonymous users, with optional email delivery. Built on django-sse and django-redis, it enables cross-session message management in web applications.

metadata.name: wallop

summary.en: Wallop is a minimal (4KB), dependency-free JavaScript library for showing and hiding elements, ideal for sliders and carousels. It manages state by adding semantic CSS classes, with animations handled entirely in CSS. It supports mobile-first design, progressive enhancement, custom events, and offers flexible APIs with built-in animation modifiers.

summary.en: qiandao is an automated check-in framework based on HAR editor, enabling multi-site auto-check-in via templates. It offers a web interface and CLI tool, supports Docker deployment, requires Python 3.11, and optionally uses Redis or MySQL. Users can upload custom templates, with admin approval for public sharing, ideal for batch website check-in management.

summary.en: GetCookies is a Chrome extension that bypasses HTTP ONLY restrictions to retrieve cookies from specified domains. It triggers via buttons with custom data attributes, supports filtering by domain and cookie name, and returns cookie data in JSON format through message event callbacks, ideal for automation tasks like daily check-ins.

summary.en: Hexo is a fast, simple, and powerful blog framework powered by Node.js. It supports GitHub Flavored Markdown, offers one-command deployment to platforms like GitHub Pages, and features a rich ecosystem of themes and plugins for building static blogs efficiently.

summary.en: Django is a high-level Python web framework designed for perfectionists with deadlines. It promotes rapid development, clean architecture, and secure deployment, featuring built-in ORM, authentication, and admin interface for scalable enterprise applications.

metadata.name: GeekBlog

summary.en: GeekBlog is a full-featured blog system built on Django 1.6.5, supporting dual database storage with MySQL and MongoDB. It integrates UEditor for rich text editing, Duoshuo for comments, and enhances Django Admin with django-admin-tools. Features include responsive design, static asset optimization via Django Pipeline, RSS feeds, and sitemap generation.

summary.en: django-guardian is a Django extension that implements per-object permissions on top of Django's built-in authentication system. It enables fine-grained access control by allowing permissions to be assigned to users or groups for specific model instances, with seamless integration into Django Admin via GuardedModelAdmin.

summary.en: Kode is a terminal-based AI assistant designed for post-human workflows, supporting the AGENTS.md standard to autonomously understand codebases, edit files, run commands, and manage full workflows. It supports multiple AI models (20+ providers), offers native binary distribution, and operates in YOLO mode by default for maximum productivity while providing a safe mode for secure environments.

summary.en: waoowaoo AI Studio is an industrial-grade, end-to-end controllable AI agent platform for professional film and TV production, supporting automatic generation of storyboards, characters, and scenes from novel text into complete videos. It features AI script analysis, character/scene generation, storyboard video assembly, AI voice synthesis, and bilingual UI, built with Hollywood-level production workflows.

summary.en: This is a modern personal portfolio built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript (strict mode), managed via Turborepo. It supports Markdown/MDX publishing, RSS feeds, sitemaps, comments, reading time, and view counters. Features smooth scroll-based animations and transitions using Motion, achieving near-perfect Lighthouse scores in performance, accessibility, and SEO.
